art.title: Ariel Agemian’s Christ Painting based on the Shroud of Turin

art.author: annig_agemian_raley
art.post: I am so pleased to read your posts! My father, if alive, would be as pleased to know and to witness the appreciation given for his work. I direct you to the newly published site. Http://www.agemianpaintings.com.
